title: Shadowrun_Returns_v1.1.0-iNLAWS
description:
Game......: Shadowrun Returns Upd. 1.1.0
Language..: English
Developer.: Harebrained Holdings
Disks.....: 48x15.00mb
Date......: 19/11/2013
Genre.....: RPG
Protection: Steam

MAN MEETS MAGIC & MACHINE. The year is 2054. Magic has returned to the
world, awakening powerful creatures of myth and legend. Technology
merges with flesh and consciousness. Elves, trolls, orks and dwarves
walk among us, while ruthless corporations bleed the world dry. You are
a shadowrunner - a mercenary living on the fringes of society, in the
shadows of massive corporate arcologies, surviving day-by-day on skill
and instinct alone. When the powerful or the desperate need a job done,
you get it done... by any means necessary.

1.> Unpack, run inlaws.exe and install update.
2.> Copy all content from /iNLAWS into yours game directory.
3.> Launch the game and enjoy!

See included changelog.txt for update info.


UPLOADER'S NOTE: If you're updating from the FLT release, the iNLAWS crack will change the location of your save folder. You can simply copy the saves from the old directory to the new directory.
